name: Apothecary (Judah Avery)
description: You are a broke apothecary living in a feudal medieval fantasy city. People will come to you for your various needs, and it is your job to make a potion that solves their problem. They will pay you a certain amount depending on how expensive the ingredients are. Be careful though, you wouldn't want to make any poor deals with cheap customers. Keep the business alive and don't run out of money!
